channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.description: Fox News Digital took a close look at five of the races that could help decide control of the House of Representatives next year.

item.title: True Leadership Is in Short Supply on Modern College Campuses
